<Text: New York State Route 157A (NY 157A)
1:
--------------------
Text: New York State Route 157A:  It serves as a 5.88 mi loop route of NY 157 through the towns of Knox and Berne, veering a considerable distance to the south to serve the hamlet of East Berne and indirectly connect NY 157 to NY 443.
